products.title: Amor Ocean Green Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Amor ocean green vertical blind
products.productdescription: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their vertical blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.productdescription: Both pretty and warm, the roma in bahia is a finely woven filter blind allows light to gently trickle through, whilst providing a blast of country colour wherever it's used. Deftly hanging louvres can be easily tilted and pulled across to open or close the blind, allowing you as much or as little light as you please.Place the bahia in a child's bedroom, where it will match fun wallpapers and furniture in bold primary colours; or create a fresh, vibrant colour scheme in the office, where white walls and medium woods will set it off perfectly.

products.title: Roma, Polar - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma, polar - vertical blind not quite mint, yet not quite aqua either, the roma in polar is a unique, icy green shade that will add a cool sophisticated to your home dcor. Soft but sturdy cotton-feel fabric gathers neatly into hanging louvres that can b
products.productdescription: Not quite mint, yet not quite aqua either, the roma in polar is a unique, icy green shade that will add a cool sophisticated to your home dcor. Soft but sturdy cotton-feel fabric gathers neatly into hanging louvres that can be opened and closed swiftly and neatly. Makeover a white bathroom by using it as the perfect canvas for the polar, supplementing it with silver fixtures and fittings; or create a gorgeous cool hue in the guest bedroom, where your visitors will love to wake up to this refreshing shade.

products.title: Roma, Fuscous Grey - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma, fuscous grey - vertical blind in slate grey and with a classically unadorned design, the sleek blind that is the roma in fuscous grey will bring contemporary cool wherever it's used. Its efficient filter function allows some soft light into the room
products.productdescription: In slate grey and with a classically unadorned design, the sleek blind that is the roma in fuscous grey will bring contemporary cool wherever it's used. Its efficient filter function allows some soft light into the room, easing it in gently without disturbing you. The fuscous grey is miles ahead when it comes to modern style, and will work beautifully with equally trendy yellows and bright pinks, both perfect colour schemes for an up-to-date living room, bedroom, or dining room.

products.title: Roma, Aqua Haze - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma, aqua haze - vertical blind there are few hues more uplifting than a gentle, pretty aqua, and that's what roma in aqua haze brings to a room. Light, supple, and tightly woven fabric provides the base for this blind, and hangs beautifully in straight
products.productdescription: There are few hues more uplifting than a gentle, pretty aqua, and that's what roma in aqua haze brings to a room. Light, supple, and tightly woven fabric provides the base for this blind, and hangs beautifully in straight louvres to be opened or closed at your leisure.Awaken to a calm, ocean feel by hanging the aqua haze in your master bedroom, where you can surround it with whites and turquoises; or use in the most contemporary of living or dining rooms, complementing with light woods and soft off-whites.

products.title: Roma, Dawn - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma, dawn - vertical blind simple and functional, the roma in dawn is ideal for creating privacy without compromising on light. The hardy but lightweight fabric is supple and durable, with a lovely cotton-like feel that emits quality and class in bucketl
products.productdescription: Simple and functional, the roma in dawn is ideal for creating privacy without compromising on light. The hardy but lightweight fabric is supple and durable, with a lovely cotton-like feel that emits quality and class in bucketloads. The dawn would look fantastic in the kitchen alongside blacks, whites, and greys for a classic monochrome look; in the dining room amongst bold blues for cool sophistication; or in the home office or bedroom alongside bold reds for a look of atmospheric functionality.

products.title: Roma, Alto - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma, alto - vertical blind the roma in alto is a sleek, smooth blind, with a tightly woven fabric and natural beige hue. The strong yet lightweight material makes an effective light filter, allowing just the right amount to trickle through. Con
products.productdescription: The roma in alto is a sleek, smooth blind, with a tightly woven fabric and natural beige hue. The strong yet lightweight material makes an effective light filter, allowing just the right amount to trickle through. Contrast against chocolate and mocha browns in the living room, highlighted by gold metallics, for a comfortable colour scheme to relax and unwind in. Or go a little bolder and use the alto to accent deep plum walls, with white and beige accents to complete the look.

products.title: Roma, Scorpion - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma, scorpion - vertical blind what better way to bring contemporary style into your home than with the gorgeous, elegant roma scorpion? Hanging neatly in adjustable louvres that can be easily slid across or gently tilted, this blind offers quality fabri
products.productdescription: What better way to bring contemporary style into your home than with the gorgeous, elegant roma scorpion? Hanging neatly in adjustable louvres that can be easily slid across or gently tilted, this blind offers quality fabric as well as chic and panache.The scorpion's cool neutrality works wonderfully as part of the uber-stylish colour scheme of yellow and grey, which can be fashionably complemented with fun chevron patterns and daring stripes. This is a perfect look for a modern kitchen or a sleek and smart bedroom.

products.title: Roma, Snuff - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma, snuff - vertical blind combining light-filtering, easy-to-use functionality with a pretty, hushed purple hue, the roma snuff will make a gorgeous addition to any home. Its lovely mauve shade means that it can provide the perfect accent colour or tak
products.productdescription: Combining light-filtering, easy-to-use functionality with a pretty, hushed purple hue, the roma snuff will make a gorgeous addition to any home. Its lovely mauve shade means that it can provide the perfect accent colour or take centre stage as the feature colour.Blend with deep aubergine purple for a bold, unapologetic look in the master bedroom, combining style and chic with romance and atmosphere; or have it sitting pretty in your downstairs hallway against soft cream walls and the palest of lilacs.

products.title: Roma, Lime - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma, lime - vertical blind put simply, the roma lime couldn't be livelier or more refreshing if it tried. Whilst it retains the smooth, tightly woven fabric so typical of the roma range, its bright green shade is much wilder, adding a vibrant colour pop
products.productdescription: Put simply, the roma lime couldn't be livelier or more refreshing if it tried. Whilst it retains the smooth, tightly woven fabric so typical of the roma range, its bright green shade is much wilder, adding a vibrant colour pop wherever it's placed.Squirt some fruity fun into your kitchen by hanging the lime as a vibrant window feature, coupled with white and light wood accents. Or go for an all-out citrus colour scheme by combining this blind with white walls and orange and lemon accents.

products.title: Roma, Mischka - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma, mischka - vertical blind light and soothing, the soft off-white of the roma in mischka adds peaceful ambience to any room. This matte, tightly woven blind is supple and easy to use, making it a practical choice as well as a pretty one. Add
products.productdescription: Light and soothing, the soft off-white of the roma in mischka adds peaceful ambience to any room. This matte, tightly woven blind is supple and easy to use, making it a practical choice as well as a pretty one. Add sanctuary to your home by using the mischka in a neutral colour scheme full of tans, taupes, and creams, gently accented by woods of all colours; this subtle, sophisticated look will work beautifully in a lounge, den, or dining room.

products.title: Roma, Thunderbird - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma, thunderbird - vertical blind the roma in thunderbird is the ideal filter blind for keeping just the right amount of light in your room when you need a little privacy or shade. Combine with that the dark, red hue and you have style and usability all
products.productdescription: The roma in thunderbird is the ideal filter blind for keeping just the right amount of light in your room when you need a little privacy or shade. Combine with that the dark, red hue and you have style and usability all in one! This strong, striking blind is here to make a statement, and a statement it will make! Help it along by placing against white or cream walls in your kitchen or dining room to really make it pop. Or use as a colourful feature in a plain hallway, landing, or utility room.

products.title: Roma, Grey Nickel - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma, grey nickel - vertical blind the cool and contemporary grey nickel, from the roma range of filter blinds, is an absolute must if you're going for sleek modern style in your home. Practical as well as smart, the blind's louvres hang deftly and can be
products.productdescription: The cool and contemporary grey nickel, from the roma range of filter blinds, is an absolute must if you're going for sleek modern style in your home. Practical as well as smart, the blind's louvres hang deftly and can be pulled aside or tilted with ease.Offset the grey nickel with sunny yellows, fruity limes, or bright oranges to create a trendy and charming colour scheme. Use these striking colour combinations in a bright home office, a relaxing dining room, or a welcoming spare bedroom.

products.title: Roma, Monza - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma, monza - vertical blind an effective filter blind, the roma monza gently filters light whilst avoiding dimming out the room completely. Red never goes out of style, being the go-to colour for bold and contemporary looks, so this blind will last throu
products.productdescription: An effective filter blind, the roma monza gently filters light whilst avoiding dimming out the room completely. Red never goes out of style, being the go-to colour for bold and contemporary looks, so this blind will last through the years, regardless of trends. The strong, striking hue used in the monza will make the perfect window feature for an all-white dining room or grey and charcoal living room. Or simply use it to add a pop of colour to a plain hallway or landing, where guests will certainly get a big welcome!

products.title: Roma, Athens Grey - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma, athens grey - vertical blind in palest grey on a smoothly textured fabric, the athens grey from the roma collection offers a unique yet gentle hue that emits elegance and taste, the perfect look for a modern home. The athens grey lends its
products.productdescription: In palest grey on a smoothly textured fabric, the athens grey from the roma collection offers a unique yet gentle hue that emits elegance and taste, the perfect look for a modern home. The athens grey lends itself to a coordinating charcoal and dove grey colour scheme, ideal for a home office; or to a palette of deep forest greens and pale greys in the den, complemented by medium, polished woods. Alternatively, go extra bold and place against a rich aubergine feature wall in your dining room, where warmth and luxury are king.

products.title: Roma, Bronco - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma, bronco - vertical blind for natural charm, choose the roma in bronco, a medium taupe fabric with a neat, tightly woven fabric, and excellent light-filtering properties, letting the light through at will, whether open or closed. Select the
products.productdescription: For natural charm, choose the roma in bronco, a medium taupe fabric with a neat, tightly woven fabric, and excellent light-filtering properties, letting the light through at will, whether open or closed. Select the bronco for a strikingly neutral home office, where you can pair it with pale beiges and soft creams. Or instead, add a tempering shade to a dark brown living room, where you can snuggle up after a long night, and where cosiness and warmth are the words of the day.

products.title: Richmond, Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Richmond, cameo - vertical blind the richmond cameo features a barely-there white base adorned with an array of lightly stitched, feathery curves in the same hue. Its louvres are easily adjustable for variable light and privacy, and hang neatly from their
products.productdescription: The richmond cameo features a barely-there white base adorned with an array of lightly stitched, feathery curves in the same hue. Its louvres are easily adjustable for variable light and privacy, and hang neatly from their rails.Use the cameo in the bathroom, where privacy is key, and clean, fresh colours look their best. Add a soft aqua or duck egg to provide quick bursts of colour, using the hue for towels, bath mats, and wall art. If you love stronger colours, include the occasional teal as a brighter accent.

products.title: Roma, Rodeo Dust - Vertical Blind

products.productdescription: A contemporary, beige filter blind, the roma in rodeo dust mixes a soft tan hue with a smooth, tightly woven fabric for a modern and streamlined look. Wherever you choose to place this blind, it will add a natural class to the room around it. Pair the rodeo dust with forest greens for an outdoorsy atmosphere in the living room, where this unusual and striking colour scheme will create an unforgettable aesthetic. Alternatively, sit it next to navy blue in your home office, offset by brilliant whites, for a room that is calm and cool, and just oozing with style.

products.title: Roma, Natural - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma, natural - vertical blind the roma in natural is just a whisper of a cream, with a finely woven fabric and a gentle, natural hue. An effective filter blind, this is the model of class, style, and neutrality. The natural will work as part of
products.productdescription: The roma in natural is just a whisper of a cream, with a finely woven fabric and a gentle, natural hue. An effective filter blind, this is the model of class, style, and neutrality. The natural will work as part of almost any colour scheme, being particularly suited to clean, fresh rooms full of soft pastels, such as pinks or blues - the perfect colour scheme for a nursery or child's bedroom. Or hang it in the living room amongst country greens and fresh, dainty florals, for a charmingly rustic feel with a contemporary twist.

products.productdescription: The ice white of the richmond pure is fresh and inviting, and its feathery lines offer texture and depth. products.productdescription: For graceful style with captivating decoration, choose the dcor in cameo where textured fibres fuse to produce an elegant creamy blind with distinctive, crescent detailing and compelling texture. This exquisite cloth sits on separate, tilting slats that allow you to control the amount of ventilation and light infiltrating the room.For a classy dining area with striking features, combine the cameo with shimmering table runners and silky serviettes. Accent the elegant cream tone of the blind with an ivory and claret colour combination, including golden candle holders and gilded accessories for added glamour.

products.productdescription: The pale canvas of the decor in cream features lightly stitched crescent shapes, gently intertwined to form a curious and attractive pattern. The fabric is lightweight yet hardy, ideal for a room and window that get plenty of footfall and use.Lay the cream against matching cream walls in a large, one-colour living room. The walls and blind, paired with similarly toned sofas, wall art, and rugs, will work together to create an airy surrounding, giving the impression of space and light.

products.title: Lux Raspberry Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Lux raspberry vertical blind
products.productdescription: With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being dimout, it will gently fileter the light entering your room when closed.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.productdescription:
Their basix blackout range is an easy and effective method of freshening up your decor. This off-white 127mm vertical blind, a traditional light neutral shade, is made of durable fabric and stylish 5 inch vanes. Updating your window blind is a simple way to update the room, and a new white blind instantly refreshes and revitalises tired-looking window. Pollergen-coated, this blackout vertical blind also helps allergy sufferers with its pollen-resistant fabric, a must for high-pollen seasons! 
 
At swift direct blinds, quality is paramount. Not only is this vertical blind cut to size by their expert vertical blinds team, but comes with a five year guarantee for piece of mind. Situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, we've been manufacturing blinds for fifty years and can confidently claim to be the experts for all things blinds and curtains!

products.productdescription: This verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being dimout and with a uniqu patern running up each vane, these blinds are great in any window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.productdescription: The light hue of the richmond (blackout) in cream belies the effectiveness of its blackout properties, formed from the thick, opaque material from which it is made. The louvres are easily adjusted to allow more or less light into the room, and when closed, none can filter through.Ensure that your visitors have a great night's sleep by hanging the cream in the guest bedroom. This blind will match a number of style choices, particularly modern, but try teaming it with a tranquil sage green for a relaxing and convivial vibe.

products.title: Milano, Waterfall - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Milano, waterfall - vertical blind to create a dcor scheme with calming colour and creativity, opt for the enchanting milano in waterfall. This exquisite cloth features a restful cornflower blue shade and a fusion of silk-inspired threads for added decor
products.productdescription: To create a dcor scheme with calming colour and creativity, opt for the enchanting milano in waterfall. This exquisite cloth features a restful cornflower blue shade and a fusion of silk-inspired threads for added decoration and texture. Plus, modern, adaptable louvres allow you to control the amount of light and breeze entering the room.Perfect for a relaxing restroom, the waterfall can be matched with a soft white background and complementing features in chalky blue and azure tones. To add a noticeable trait to this modest scheme, include a little industrial edge with platinum fittings and silver accessories.

products.title: Lusso, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Lusso, cream - vertical blind the lusso in cream has a paper-soft feel, making it a pleasing and appealing blind to touch. Its hue is a beautiful, homely cream, perfect for hanging in a modern family home. Between the discreet stitching and the texture of
products.productdescription: The lusso in cream has a paper-soft feel, making it a pleasing and appealing blind to touch. Its hue is a beautiful, homely cream, perfect for hanging in a modern family home. Between the discreet stitching and the texture of the fabric, a lightly checked appearance is formed, whilst the blind is all one colour.The cream would make a perfect addition to the kitchen, where its functional look and feel will suit the purpose of the room wonderfully. Team it with soft sky blues for a fresh and summery ambience, using brushed silvers as the trim throughout.

products.title: Burlington, Waterfall - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Burlington, waterfall - vertical blind in a gorgeous shade of baby blue, the burlington waterfall is reminiscent of blue summer sky, and the gently curved lines of the patterning, with its intricate and varied stitching, only add to the blind's dreamy eff
products.productdescription: In a gorgeous shade of baby blue, the burlington waterfall is reminiscent of blue summer sky, and the gently curved lines of the patterning, with its intricate and varied stitching, only add to the blind's dreamy effect. Give a nursery a sweet and subtle pop of colour by including the waterfall in the window. The colour is soft enough to help craft a calming ambience in the room whilst simultaneously bringing life and colour the scheme. Accent with off-whites and pale greys for a cute and tranquil palette.

products.title: Burlington, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Burlington, cream - vertical blind a pretty, yellowy tone, the burlington in cream is a homely blind with a somewhat traditional look and feel. Well-stitched curves adorn this high quality blind, and the sleek louvres offer a contemporary edge to an other
products.productdescription: A pretty, yellowy tone, the burlington in cream is a homely blind with a somewhat traditional look and feel. Well-stitched curves adorn this high quality blind, and the sleek louvres offer a contemporary edge to an otherwise classic fabric.Give the cream a home amidst fellow creams, oatmeals, and fawns, where it will sit pretty in this field of neutrals. This light look will give a living room or dining room a feeling of spaciousness and light, and can be easily accented with brushed golds or bronzes.

products.title: Burlington, Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Burlington, cameo - vertical blind intended to catch the eye, the burlington in cameo hosts a collection of beguiling textures in a brilliant, classy white, and a distinctive arrangement. Containing refined, satin-like threads to generate an engaging blin
products.productdescription: Intended to catch the eye, the burlington in cameo hosts a collection of beguiling textures in a brilliant, classy white, and a distinctive arrangement. Containing refined, satin-like threads to generate an engaging blind, it offers modern, adaptable louvres to suit your shading and privacy preferences. For a sleek and stylish dcor scheme in your dining area, coordinate the cameo with similar, satiny textures, such as silky napkins and a glossy table runner. products.productdescription: The kerry midnight blue vertical blind is a rich, deep blue colour - slightly darker than navy blue, but is a very smart and stylish colour. Use this alongside similar darker blue tones in your home and use this blind to complement similar navy blue tones in your home. Being a blackout fabric means that this blind is perfect for your bedroom as the fabric will stop all of the light from passing through it. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Roma (FR), Beige - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma (fr), beige - vertical blind for a modest look with soothing shade, choose the roma (fr) in beige, which hosts a calming oatmeal hue on a crisp and contemporary cloth. The modern style and adjustable slats of the blind allow you to create a chic disp
products.productdescription: For a modest look with soothing shade, choose the roma (fr) in beige, which hosts a calming oatmeal hue on a crisp and contemporary cloth. The modern style and adjustable slats of the blind allow you to create a chic display that lets you control the amount of light and air entering the room.Match the beige with harmonising walls in a sumptuous biscuit shade, adding a deeper taupe to accent the tone of the blind and for an assortment of similar hues. Complete this soothing and sophisticated look with golden embellishments and gilded features.

products.title: Roma (FR), Almond - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma (fr), almond - vertical blind the nutty, creamy oatmeal of the almond, and the subtle style that it emits, belies its highly practical qualities. The roma (fr) range is flame-retardant, making it perfect for either a commercial property or a domestic
products.productdescription: The nutty, creamy oatmeal of the almond, and the subtle style that it emits, belies its highly practical qualities. The roma (fr) range is flame-retardant, making it perfect for either a commercial property or a domestic one, and the louvres are easily adjusted to allow you more or less light or privacy.Feeling bold? Hang the almond against a bold, tropical purple feature wall in the dining room, where it will provide a necessary break to a bold, albeit beautiful, shade. For the remainder of the room, turn the tables, using oatmeals as a base and purple to accent.

products.title: Roma (FR), Dark Blue - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma (fr), dark blue - vertical blind almost navy, the dark blue from the roma (fr) range is a flame-retardant blind with heaps of style and bags of practicality. The deep blue hue is oceanic and attractive, sitting sleekly on a smooth, lightweight fabric
products.productdescription: Almost navy, the dark blue from the roma (fr) range is a flame-retardant blind with heaps of style and bags of practicality. The deep blue hue is oceanic and attractive, sitting sleekly on a smooth, lightweight fabric with a high quality and durable design.Makeover your dining room by combining the dark blue with pale greys and pure whites. The resulting look will be strong and bold, yet with an air of class and sophistication. If you're particularly brave, you might even create a feature wall using a matching dark blue paint or patterned wallpaper!

products.title: Deanna, Mist - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Deanna, mist - vertical blind the tempered neutrality of the deanna mist brings a cool, traditional feel to whichever window it's used in. This off-white blind is made from a long-lasting, quality fabric that hangs neatly as easily manoeuvrable louvres th
products.productdescription: The tempered neutrality of the deanna mist brings a cool, traditional feel to whichever window it's used in. This off-white blind is made from a long-lasting, quality fabric that hangs neatly as easily manoeuvrable louvres that you can adjust according to your light and privacy needs. The mist will add a cool look to warmer, bolder colours, such as burgundy in the dining room, plum in the living room, or chocolate in the kitchen. It can be beautifully accented by golds or silvers, so hang it amongst your favourite colours and accessorise well for a stylish and enviable dcor scheme.

products.title: Tiffany, Gentle - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Tiffany, gentle - vertical blind gentle by name, gentle by nature, this cream offering from the tiffany range is soft in texture but hardy in quality; yet despite its light hue, offers character and intrigue using a curved, wispy pattern that covers the l
products.productdescription: Gentle by name, gentle by nature, this cream offering from the tiffany range is soft in texture but hardy in quality; yet despite its light hue, offers character and intrigue using a curved, wispy pattern that covers the length of the fabric. Use as part of a brown colour scheme in the living room, by placing against cappuccino walls and dark chocolate soft furnishings. Or why not add a touch of sophistication to a family den, home office, or dining room? With the gentle, endless possibilities await!

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Graphite - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Origin (blackout), graphite - vertical blind the origin (blackout) in graphite gives a fantastically contemporary effect that is so versatile that it can be paired with almost any colour scheme. Made from high quality, lightweight fabric that is durable a
products.productdescription: The origin (blackout) in graphite gives a fantastically contemporary effect that is so versatile that it can be paired with almost any colour scheme. Made from high quality, lightweight fabric that is durable and long-lasting, this is a functional option as well as a chic one. Accent with silvers and whites for a modern living room; team with a bold red to make a statement in the dining room; or create a feature window in a white or cream hallway. Whichever option you go for, the graphite is sure to meet expectations.

products.title: Deanna, Latte - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Deanna, latte - vertical blind soft and neutral, with a curved twist pattern to add depth and interest, the deanna in latte will add subtle class to any home. This warm filter blind is a pretty taupe fabric with a high quality finish, and its easy-to-use
products.productdescription: Soft and neutral, with a curved twist pattern to add depth and interest, the deanna in latte will add subtle class to any home. This warm filter blind is a pretty taupe fabric with a high quality finish, and its easy-to-use tilting mechanism makes it long-lasting and durable. A neutral colour scheme in the home office can feel relaxing and tranquil, a feeling many of us need in order to be able to work effectively. Pair the latte with matching taupe walls and accessorise with medium woods and brushed gold accessories.

products.title: Deanna, Soft Cream - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Deanna, soft cream - vertical blind the pretty, neutral shade of the deanna in soft cream is an easily coordinated colour, fitting in with a wide range of colour schemes around the home. An easy mixture of the traditional and the contemporary, this blind
products.productdescription: The pretty, neutral shade of the deanna in soft cream is an easily coordinated colour, fitting in with a wide range of colour schemes around the home. An easy mixture of the traditional and the contemporary, this blind brings class and sophistication wherever it goes. Use amidst dark chocolate and soft mocha browns in your living or dining room, or give a rustic kitchen a classy, modern twist. The soft cream will look especially stylish when coupled with taupe walls and dark woods.

products.title: Deanna, Cool Grey - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Deanna, cool grey - vertical blind sweet and subtle, the deanna in cool grey is a pleasure to behold, with its soft, silvery hue and gently curved patterning, which adds a little depth to an otherwise simple blind. Paired with the right colour scheme and
products.productdescription: Sweet and subtle, the deanna in cool grey is a pleasure to behold, with its soft, silvery hue and gently curved patterning, which adds a little depth to an otherwise simple blind. Paired with the right colour scheme and dcor choices, this filter blind can look simply stunning in your home. Team the cool grey with blacks and whites to maintain a contemporary, monochrome colour scheme, offset by hints of silver in the form of ornaments and frames. This would make a beautiful look for a modern bedroom or living room, where style and sophistication are everything.

products.title: Tiffany, Imagine - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Tiffany, imagine - vertical blind a cool, pale shade of cream, the tiffany in imagine displays a wispy, curved pattern that will catch the eye at the same time as the light. The smooth, quality fabric, and gently raised stitching, is fine yet resilient, a
products.productdescription: A cool, pale shade of cream, the tiffany in imagine displays a wispy, curved pattern that will catch the eye at the same time as the light. The smooth, quality fabric, and gently raised stitching, is fine yet resilient, and hangs neatly in well-ordered louvres.Use in a kitchen amongst sunny yellows or cool blues, or add some life to your home office window without adding too much colour. Alternatively, the imagine will add class to a guest bedroom window, paired with soft pastel colours.

products.title: Roma (FR), Ebony - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma (fr), ebony - vertical blind go bold with the roma (fr) in ebony for a dramatic window display that's certain to grab your visitors' attention. This contemporary black blind features a crisp and considerable fabric which forms a modern look with stri
products.productdescription: Go bold with the roma (fr) in ebony for a dramatic window display that's certain to grab your visitors' attention. This contemporary black blind features a crisp and considerable fabric which forms a modern look with striking effect, and provides the added bonus of tilting louvres for your shading and privacy needs.Fashion a striking dcor scheme in your lounge by featuring the ebony amidst punchy fuschia walls and polished, ebony furniture. Include an array of cushions and throws in tropical pink and broody black, adding lush green pot plants for a dash of lively colour.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Steel - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Origin (blackout), steel - vertical blind the smooth neutral of the origin (blackout) steel is a versatile shade of grey-beige that works well with almost any colour it comes across. The quality blackout fabric works well as adjustable louvres, which can
products.productdescription: The smooth neutral of the origin (blackout) steel is a versatile shade of grey-beige that works well with almost any colour it comes across. The quality blackout fabric works well as adjustable louvres, which can be moved according to how much light you want in your room. Complement a rich burgundy for a traditional colour scheme in the lounge or den, or pair with browns and taupes for a cosy, modern feel in the kitchen. The steel will also sit easily in a utility room or hallway, where many homes lack space and character.

products.title: Roma (FR), Snow - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Roma (fr), snow - vertical blind from the safety conscious roma (fr) collection, the snow is a flame retardant blind, making it the perfect pick for a commercial property. Its practicality doesn't end there though, as the tilted vertical slats can be adju
products.productdescription: From the safety conscious roma (fr) collection, the snow is a flame retardant blind, making it the perfect pick for a commercial property. Its practicality doesn't end there though, as the tilted vertical slats can be adjusted to suit your desired light, privacy, and ventilation.The snow will provide the ideal accent to a bold and bright colour scheme in a home office, where a sense of life and energy is all-important. Place it on a feature wall coloured in cobalt blue or sunshine yellow, complementing the look with matching tones throughout the room.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Flamingo - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Origin (blackout), flamingo - vertical blind add a touch of vigour to a dim window with the origin (blackout) in flamingo. This supple blind has a smooth feel and neatly hanging louvres that can be tilted or moved according to how much light you want to l
products.productdescription: Add a touch of vigour to a dim window with the origin (blackout) in flamingo. This supple blind has a smooth feel and neatly hanging louvres that can be tilted or moved according to how much light you want to let into the room. Make the flamingo stand out by placing in a white bathroom or kitchen, with only colour-coordinated accessories to accent the deep pink colour. Or use in a child's bedroom, amongst baby pinks, soft whites, and contemporary florals.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Illusion - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Origin (blackout), illusion - vertical blind the origin (blackout) in illusion is a light, agile fabric in a candy pink colour, making it both striking in appearance and easily usable. Gently tilt the louvres to allow the light to pour through, or close a
products.productdescription: The origin (blackout) in illusion is a light, agile fabric in a candy pink colour, making it both striking in appearance and easily usable. Gently tilt the louvres to allow the light to pour through, or close again to keep it out - whichever you choose, it will be quick and easy to do. Hang the illusion in a vintage-style kitchen, accented by off-white walls and shabby chic furniture. Decorate with old retro advert posters in complementary colours, and you'll have the most fashionable kitchen around!

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Taupe - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Origin (blackout), taupe - vertical blind a dark taupe in colour, the appropriately named origin (blackout) taupe is a wonderfully tactile, cotton-feel fabric that you'll find you just love to touch. Regardless of its forgiving feel, the high quality fabr
products.productdescription: A dark taupe in colour, the appropriately named origin (blackout) taupe is a wonderfully tactile, cotton-feel fabric that you'll find you just love to touch. Regardless of its forgiving feel, the high quality fabric is hardwearing and resilient, effortlessly serving its purpose as a proficient blackout blind. For warm, welcoming atmosphere, place the taupe against your kitchen window, surrounded by soft creams and the occasional darker brown. Or for tougher, less luxurious look, team with greys and bold prints in your home office or dining room.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Chambray - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Origin (blackout), chambray - vertical blind the origin (blackout) in chambray is a bright and brave hue that will keep out light disturbances whilst adding an attractive feature piece to your room. The smooth texture of the quality fabric used is perfect
products.productdescription: The origin (blackout) in chambray is a bright and brave hue that will keep out light disturbances whilst adding an attractive feature piece to your room. The smooth texture of the quality fabric used is perfect for its moveable louvres, which can be tilted at ease. This contemporary blue shade will add a splash of colour to an otherwise neutral bathroom or kitchen, making for a cool, calm, and collected environment. Or instead, use in the home office, alongside bright whites or cool baby blues.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Bright Orange - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Origin (blackout), bright orange - vertical blind the origin (blackout) in bright orange boasts a flame-coloured fabric that hangs neatly in louvres that are easily adjustable for light and privacy. This blind will certainly steal the show, no matter wher
products.productdescription: The origin (blackout) in bright orange boasts a flame-coloured fabric that hangs neatly in louvres that are easily adjustable for light and privacy. This blind will certainly steal the show, no matter where it's placed, so why not take a walk on the wild side and make a statement in your home? For a warm, vibrant look in a cosy den, combine the bright orange with off-white walls and accenting accessories. Or create a statement feature in your hallway or landing, where your guests are sure to notice it.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Dark Purple - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Origin (blackout), dark purple - vertical blind the deep shade of the origin (blackout) in dark purple can't help but be the star of the show, with its smooth texture and lightweight feel. Let the outside in, or keep it out, by adjusting the louvres accor
products.productdescription: The deep shade of the origin (blackout) in dark purple can't help but be the star of the show, with its smooth texture and lightweight feel. Let the outside in, or keep it out, by adjusting the louvres accordingly. Set the dark purple against pale cream walls and bring the colour to life with occasional silver ornaments, frames, and fittings. Or instead, give your hallway or landing a boost of colour to add depth and intrigue to magnolia or beige walls.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Oyster - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Origin (blackout), oyster - vertical blind the oyster blind, from the origin (blackout) range, is subtlety at its best. The soft cream fabric radiates luxurious sophistication, whilst still maintaining a confident neutrality that helps it to match almost
products.productdescription: The oyster blind, from the origin (blackout) range, is subtlety at its best. The soft cream fabric radiates luxurious sophistication, whilst still maintaining a confident neutrality that helps it to match almost any colour. For a country, shaker-style kitchen, sit the oyster amongst matching cream units, with wooden worktops and rustic furniture, accompanied by pretty florals and vintage-style appliances. Or treat the bathroom to a similar dcor scheme, using soft pinks and garden greens to accent this pretty louvre blind.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Coffee - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Origin (blackout), coffee - vertical blind the origin (blackout) in coffee is indeed a deep coffee shade of brown, and forms an effective blackout blind with its durable, opaque fabric. Neat louvres hang from the rail and can be tilted and moved as you pl
products.productdescription: The origin (blackout) in coffee is indeed a deep coffee shade of brown, and forms an effective blackout blind with its durable, opaque fabric. Neat louvres hang from the rail and can be tilted and moved as you please - or indeed as the sun dictates! Group the coffee with hues of the same ilk, such as pale cappuccinos and soft mochas, to create the perfect colour scheme for the kitchen, where you'll be drinking your morning tea. Alternatively, go for luxury in the bedroom by offsetting the coffee with rich golds and brasses.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Amour - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Origin (blackout), amour - vertical blind a delicate pale pink and a sprightly, light fabric come together here to form the origin (blackout) in amour, a romantic and pretty vertical blind. The lightweight louvres can be moved across and tilted to suit yo
products.productdescription: A delicate pale pink and a sprightly, light fabric come together here to form the origin (blackout) in amour, a romantic and pretty vertical blind. The lightweight louvres can be moved across and tilted to suit your needs, and are durable and long-lasting in quality. The amour will create an ethereal, romantic vibe when paired with dainty country florals in a bedroom, and is best complemented by creams and whites, along with stronger pink shades. Or instead, place amongst country greens to recreate the colours of the outdoors in your living room or kitchen.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Oyster Grey - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Origin (blackout), oyster grey - vertical blind so subtle in colour that it's barely there, the origin (blackout) in oyster grey offers just a hint of colour to blend in beautifully with existing dcor. Despite its understated texture and hue, this is a m
products.productdescription: So subtle in colour that it's barely there, the origin (blackout) in oyster grey offers just a hint of colour to blend in beautifully with existing dcor. Despite its understated texture and hue, this is a mighty blackout blind, ideal for blocking out the outside light. For a neutral look in a home office or bedroom, team the oyster grey with taupes and soft greys, to add calm and serenity to your home. This is the model blind to use as a taming accent in an otherwise bold room that needs something soft and discreet to break it up.

products.title: Anthology, Abyss - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Anthology, abyss - vertical blind the light, natural brown of the anthology in abyss makes for a blind that is truly fit for purpose, with a supple, woven fabric that will pull its weight amongst all kinds of colour schemes and dcor styles.This
products.productdescription: The light, natural brown of the anthology in abyss makes for a blind that is truly fit for purpose, with a supple, woven fabric that will pull its weight amongst all kinds of colour schemes and dcor styles.This pretty country fabric blend perfectly in a rustic setting, such as a living room filled with hessians, natural woods, and shabby chic furniture. Alternatively, use in the bathroom amidst bright turquoises or lively greens to create a gorgeous colour scheme that you won't want to walk out of.

products.title: Anthology, Moonstone - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Anthology, moonstone - vertical blind the purposeful style of the anthology in moonstone provides the best of both worlds with its gorgeous, woven texture and natural beige hue. The light, supple fabric is of the highest quality, and hangs in neat louvres
products.productdescription: The purposeful style of the anthology in moonstone provides the best of both worlds with its gorgeous, woven texture and natural beige hue. The light, supple fabric is of the highest quality, and hangs in neat louvres for easy workability.The traditional room for such a natural material might be the kitchen, where it will undeniably look fantastic amongst hessian fabrics and woven wicker, but why not couple the moonstone with deep chocolate browns in a country living room instead? With this versatile fabric, you'll never run out of options!

products.title: Anthology, Cobra - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Anthology, cobra - vertical blind the anthology in cobra combines a rich brown colour with a lightweight woven fabric, cut into streamlined louvres that hang neatly from the rail and can be easily tilted or moved to change the light content of the room as
products.productdescription: The anthology in cobra combines a rich brown colour with a lightweight woven fabric, cut into streamlined louvres that hang neatly from the rail and can be easily tilted or moved to change the light content of the room as you please. The natural look and feel of the cobra makes it ideal to hang above a workstation in a tranquil office, where light and air is an absolute must. Otherwise, try it in the kitchen to create a traditionally country feel, set against forest greens and rich terracottas.

products.title: Apollo, Endeavour - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Apollo, endeavour - vertical blind the apollo in endeavour features a lightweight, pliable fabric in rich, cream shade, with lightly textured patterning dusted over the top. Adjustable louvres can be easily tilted or moved to protect you and your room fro
products.productdescription: The apollo in endeavour features a lightweight, pliable fabric in rich, cream shade, with lightly textured patterning dusted over the top. Adjustable louvres can be easily tilted or moved to protect you and your room from light disturbances and excess heat as and when you please. Combine the endeavour with deep forest greens or rich terracottas for an outdoorsy look in the kitchen or dining room, where medium woods will fit best. Or inject some subtle calm into your brown-themed living room or den, where relaxation is key.

products.title: Apollo, Aspire - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Apollo, aspire - vertical blind the apollo in aspire is a calming, natural-coloured vertical blind, made from a lightweight, yet robust, high quality fabric whose neatly hanging louvres keep the light and the heat out as and when you need them to.<br
products.productdescription: The apollo in aspire is a calming, natural-coloured vertical blind, made from a lightweight, yet robust, high quality fabric whose neatly hanging louvres keep the light and the heat out as and when you need them to.Sit the aspire amongst gentle country greens, dusky blues, or muted pinks for a lovely, cosy feeling in your living room or kitchen. Accessorise with hessian fabrics, wicker furniture, and rustic woods, for a truly shabby chic style that is so on trend right now.

products.title: Bari SPC, Merino - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bari spc, merino - vertical blind for a traditional yet modern window display, opt for the bari spc merino, a contemporary blind with adjustable louvres. This practical feature allows you to move the slats accordingly, filtering the desired amount of ligh
products.productdescription: For a traditional yet modern window display, opt for the bari spc merino, a contemporary blind with adjustable louvres. This practical feature allows you to move the slats accordingly, filtering the desired amount of light and breeze. And if that wasn't enough, this quality fabric also carries a solar protective coating that repels the suns heat without affecting the fabric.Use the merino in your master bedroom to form a sophisticated colour scheme. Stick to a coordinating cream background, adding colour and character by featuring a striking plum or maroon shade, and gilded accessories for added glamour.

products.title: Bari SPC, Astra - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bari spc, astra - vertical blind with its tilting louvres, which allow you to control the room's levels of light, ventilation, and privacy, and its solar protective coating to reflect the sun's rays, the bari spc astra is nothing if not practical. Add to
products.productdescription: With its tilting louvres, which allow you to control the room's levels of light, ventilation, and privacy, and its solar protective coating to reflect the sun's rays, the bari spc astra is nothing if not practical. Add to this its rich, creamy tone, and you have a blind that is both functional and packed full of style.Complement a rustic country kitchen by including the astra amongst organic shades of apple green, terracotta, and sky blue. Go for country-style multicoloured tiling and natural, unfinished woods, and find yourself in a beautifully cosy room that you won't want to leave!

products.title: Bari SPC, Coconut - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bari spc, coconut - vertical blind the milky coconut brings a warm, neutral cream tone, with a fresh and clean aesthetic, to the lightly textured bari spc collection. Sitting neatly in vertical slats, the fabric is lightweight yet durable, offering a mode
products.productdescription: The milky coconut brings a warm, neutral cream tone, with a fresh and clean aesthetic, to the lightly textured bari spc collection. Sitting neatly in vertical slats, the fabric is lightweight yet durable, offering a modern look and feel.Dabble in an all-white colour scheme in the living room by combining the coconut with varying shades of white and cream, using these soft tones for everything from walls and floors to furniture and ornaments. With the occasional hint of gold, this will form a luxe and sophisticated decor style.

products.title: Bari SPC, Mischka - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bari spc, mischka - vertical blind the mischka, from the bari spc range, displays the palest of greys, adorned with fine stitching and gentle ribbing. Practical as ever, this spc blind reflects the sun's harsh rays, allowing you a controlled and even temp
products.productdescription: The mischka, from the bari spc range, displays the palest of greys, adorned with fine stitching and gentle ribbing. Practical as ever, this spc blind reflects the sun's harsh rays, allowing you a controlled and even temperature no matter the time of year.For true contemporary chic, match the mischka with mustard yellows and darker slate greys, using the blind as a tempering accent to a bold colour scheme. This decor style would be ideal for a trendy yet studious home office.

products.title: Bari SPC, Governor Bay - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bari spc, governor bay - vertical blind displaying a bold, luscious petrol blue, the governor bay stems from the bari spc collection, a range of practical blinds with a useful sun protective coating to reflect strong, warming rays, helping you to prevent
products.productdescription: Displaying a bold, luscious petrol blue, the governor bay stems from the bari spc collection, a range of practical blinds with a useful sun protective coating to reflect strong, warming rays, helping you to prevent your home from overheating in the summer.Go all out blue in the bathroom by hanging the governor bay amidst a white suite and pale blue walls. Choose vintage-inspired blue and white patterned tiles, accenting the look with antique finds and naked, unfinished woods.

products.title: Bari SPC, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bari spc, pure - vertical blind appropriately named, the bari spc in pure displays a beautifully clean, lily white hue that serves as the perfect canvas for the lightly stitched texturing of the thick yet papery fabric. The adjustable louvres hang in an o
products.productdescription: Appropriately named, the bari spc in pure displays a beautifully clean, lily white hue that serves as the perfect canvas for the lightly stitched texturing of the thick yet papery fabric. The adjustable louvres hang in an orderly fashion to convey a neat and contemporary aesthetic.Craft a refreshingly airy atmosphere in the master bedroom by combining the pure with matching white walls and bedlinen, opting for polished wooden floorboards and light wood furniture. Add the occasional pretty floral for a country look or stick to clean lines for modern chic.

products.title: Bari SPC, Rhino - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bari spc, rhino - vertical blind the beautiful midnight blue of the rhino gives a dreamy edge to this contemporary bari spc blind. Adorned with fine stitching in a matching blue, the fabric is sturdy and durable yet with a soft, paper-like texture.<b
products.productdescription: The beautiful midnight blue of the rhino gives a dreamy edge to this contemporary bari spc blind. Adorned with fine stitching in a matching blue, the fabric is sturdy and durable yet with a soft, paper-like texture.Complement the rhino with shimmering silvers for a modern, streamlined look in a teenager's bedroom. Choose white or pale grey paint for the walls, and match bedlinen to the deep blue of the blind. Accent throughout with silver ornaments, plush cushions, and wall art.

products.title: Bari SPC, Cararra - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bari spc, cararra - vertical blind a pretty shade of cream, the bari spc in cararra offers all of the practicality of its range along with a subtle sense of style. As well as the multifaceted functionality of the adjustable louvres, the fabric is backed w
products.productdescription: A pretty shade of cream, the bari spc in cararra offers all of the practicality of its range along with a subtle sense of style. As well as the multifaceted functionality of the adjustable louvres, the fabric is backed with a solar protective coating to reflect unwanted sunlight, keeping overly warm temperatures at bay.The cararra is the ideal choice for taming bolder tones of plum or aubergine, making for a beautifully striking scheme. Paint a feature wall in your chosen shade and use the blind to soften the look, maintaining a matching palette throughout the remainder of the room.

products.title: Bari SPC, Tuscany - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bari spc, tuscany - vertical blind the deep, mature red of the tuscany brings a sophisticated yet country vibe to the ever practical bari spc range. Fully adjustable louvres hang neatly from the rail, providing a sleek and modern edge to this otherwise tr
products.productdescription: The deep, mature red of the tuscany brings a sophisticated yet country vibe to the ever practical bari spc range. Fully adjustable louvres hang neatly from the rail, providing a sleek and modern edge to this otherwise traditional blind.Match the dark red tuscany with soft, country creams for a contemporary take on country style. Go for wooden floors and cream walls, using a similar shade of red for additions such as throws and cushions. Stick to traditional, polished woods for the furniture.

products.title: Bari SPC, Manatee - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bari spc, manatee - vertical blind in sleek slate grey, the bari spc in manatee offers a contemporary and clean aesthetic, complemented by barely-there stitching to provide texture and depth. Its solar protective coating gives this blind additional practi
products.productdescription: In sleek slate grey, the bari spc in manatee offers a contemporary and clean aesthetic, complemented by barely-there stitching to provide texture and depth. Its solar protective coating gives this blind additional practicality by reflecting the sun's rays to keep the room nice and cool.Accent the manatee with a vibrant lime green in your home office to bring the grey tone to life. Opt for metallic, modern furniture for a hint of industrial style, going for unfinished wooden flooring and matching lime oddments.

products.title: Bari SPC, Sienna - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bari spc, sienna - vertical blind the 'peaches 'n' cream' tone of the bari spc's sienna is as sweet as they come, displaying a pale, pinky peach hue with a somewhat vintage feel. The design of the blind itself, however, is sleek and contemporary, with a m
products.productdescription: The 'peaches 'n' cream' tone of the bari spc's sienna is as sweet as they come, displaying a pale, pinky peach hue with a somewhat vintage feel. The design of the blind itself, however, is sleek and contemporary, with a modern fabric hanging neatly in streamlined vertical slats.For pretty sophistication in an older child's, pair the sienna with a gentle cream hue, keeping the same, barely-there tones throughout the room. Add the occasional pattern, such as cute polka dots or smart candy stripes, to provide a sense of depth and character.

products.title: Bari SPC, Perano - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Bari spc, perano - vertical blind the sweet sky blue of the bari spc perano offers a cheery, summery hue, not contradicted by the clean, papery feel of the fabric, which is tough and durable. The neatly hanging louvres are easily adjusted to allow more or
products.productdescription: The sweet sky blue of the bari spc perano offers a cheery, summery hue, not contradicted by the clean, papery feel of the fabric, which is tough and durable. The neatly hanging louvres are easily adjusted to allow more or less light, air, and privacy.Give your kitchen a happy-go-lucky lift by settling the perano in amongst white units and tiles. By adding a sunshine yellow and plenty of light, rustic woods, you can achieve a contemporary country look sure to put a smile on your face during mealtimes.
